titleStmt.title: A hue and-cry after Morgan Hews post-man in Southwark: or, A full and true account of his breaking open a letter supposing ther had been chequer bills for money, and it proved a bond to be put in sut.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Smith, on London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
